item.title: Java Versions and Features
item.description: Java is the language that is updated with new versions and features frequently. J2SE 8 is the present version of the Java. Lets drive into the history of the Java Versions and Features in detail. All the versions of the Java have their Code Names (Click hereÂ for code names and release dates) Following are the Versions and Features of Java.
